official_title: A bill to authorize appropriations to carry out section 7 of the Anadromous Fish Conservation Act during fiscal year 1985.

summary.text: Amends the Anadromous Fish Conservation Act to authorize appropriations for FY 1985 for certain studies on the population and distribution of striped bass.
